DataElement.preferredName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Performed Assessment Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of the vineland adaptive behavior scales.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An instrument for evaluation of social functioning in individuals from preschool to 18 years old.  Focusing on adaptive behaviors, the results are meant to support the diagnosis of intellectual and developmental disabilities._Executed and carried through to completion.
